title: The Banner Saga MULTi7-PROPHET
description:
The Banner Saga  (c) Stoic

release date ...: June 2767
protection .....: Steam
# of discs .....: 1
languages ......: EN/FR/DE/ES/PL/RU/PT-BR

Live through an epic role-playing Viking saga where
your  strategic  choices   directly   affect   your
personal journey. Make allies as  you  travel  with
your  caravan  across  this  stunning   yet   harsh
landscape. Carefully choose  those  who  will  help
fight a  new  threat  that  jeopardizes  an  entire
civilization. Every decision you  make  in  travel,
conversation and combat has a meaningful effect  on
the outcome as your  story  unfolds.  Not  everyone
will survive, but they will be remembered.

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the cracked content from PROPHET dir to
<installdir>win32 folder
4- Go To Hell!

NOTE:
The game is updated to v2.6.47. Soundtrack and  Mod
Content are included. Launch the game with shortcut
created with  our  installer  or  create  your  own
shortcut to:

<installdir>win32The Banner Saga.exe

with parameters:

-console --saga saga1/saga1.json.z --new_music --offline

Language can be changed in the options menu!
